entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 p.m. CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
